description:
The Rat Sutra scares off a thief. A snake is struck down by the gods. A wife sacrifices her life to the gods to finish the harvest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nezumi Kyou / Godayuuike no Daija / Yomeda no Hanashi
The Rat Sutra / The Great Snake of Gondayuu Lake / A Tale of Yomeda
ねずみ経 / 権太夫池の大蛇 / 嫁田のはなし
